name: Inn Mage
description:
Inn Mage combines two game types: management simulation and role-playing. As a mage, you need to creatively use magic scrolls to manage inn and deal with competitor.

If

What you want to play is a typical inn management game. The Inn Mage will disappoint you because:
  • Food: only roast meat and beer.
  • Furniture: only table, bench, bed, oven.
  • Customer: you don't need to take care of them. You just don't attack them.
  • Employee: you can only summon skeletons as employees by using the magic scroll.
  • Competitor: It really exists and needs you to deal with it.
  • Magic scroll: you need to use magic scroll creatively to win, rather than just rely on expanding the inn.
  • Combat: just like other ARPGs.
  • Steal: just like other RPGs.

If

You bought Inn Mage accidentally and need a refund. Please come here http://help.steampowered.com Submit a refund request.
